title: Handkerchief, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: White souvenir handkerchief decorated with scenes of the New York World's Fair of 1939. Included are the Hall of Communication, Perisphere and Trylon, Textile Building, Railroad Building and more. Printed in red, green and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer. 1941-61-22.
